description: This file initializes a PDF URL knowledge base, sets up an agent with this knowledge, and runs a query asynchronously to retrieve information about making Thai curry using the knowledge base.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that retrieves PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: PDFUrlReader
classes.description: A reader that fetches and processes PDF files from URLs.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client used for storing and retrieving vector embeddings.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a query, formatted in markdown.

calls: asyncio.run(agent.aprint_response("How to make Thai curry?", markdown=True))
